flawed_nl_solution:

She has earned $90 because 900 x 0.1 = <<900*0.1=90>>90
She has to earn $57 more dollars because 150 - 90 = <<150-90=57>>57
She has to mow 570 more square feet of lawns because 57 / 0.1 = <<57/0.1=570>>570

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 57. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
